de.tEngine.core

Class Scene

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tEngine.core.Scene

  • public class Scene
extends java.lang.Object
    Scene holds an entire game scene.
    Author:
    Tim Schneider

      • prepareFrame

        protected void prepareFrame()
        This method is invoked before rendering. Insert all your work to do before rendering here.

      • Render

        public void Render()
        This render method is automatically called once per frame. It is not necessary to call it manually.

      • CleanUp

        public void CleanUp()
        Override this method to do some clean up work for the scene

      • AddGameObject

        public void AddGameObject(GameObject go)
        Adds a GameObject to the scene's list of instances. Only objects which are part of this list of instances will be rendered by the renderer. The GameObjects are internally stored in a HashMap order by the models their are using. This fact makes rendering the scene even faster.
        Parameters:
        go - The GameObject to add to the scene

      • getClearColor

        public java.awt.Color getClearColor()
